Blademaster.description: Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

Blaster.description: Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects and can critically hit.

Demolitionist.description: Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stun their for 1.50 seconds. (Once per spellcast)

Infiltrator.description: Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline. Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds at the start of combat, refreshes on takedown

Mercenary.description: Innate: Upgrades for Mercenaries's spells have a chance to appear in the shop.

ManaReaver.description: Mana-Reaver attacks increase the mana cost of their target’s next spell by 40%

Protector.description: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

Sniper.description: Snipers deal 15% increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

Sorcerer.description: All allies have increased Spell Power.

Celestial.description: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

Chrono.description: All allies gain 15% Attack Speed every some seconds.

Cybernetic.description: Cybernetic champions with at least one item gain Health and Attack Damage.

DarkStar.description: When a Dark Star Champion dies, all other allied Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power

MechPilot.description: The Super-Mech has the combined Pilots Health, Attack Damage, and Traits of its Pilots, as well as 3 random items from among them. When the Super-Mech dies the Pilots are ejected, continue to fight.

Rebel.description: At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and increased damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for 8 seconds.

SpacePirate.description: Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.

StarGuardian.description: Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians spread among them.

Valkyrie.description: Valkyrie attacks and spells always critically hit targets below 40% health.

Void.description: Attacks and spells from Void champions deal true damage.

Starship.description: Innate: Starships gain 40 Mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but can't Basic Attack.
